segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is just running, pouring water into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh dear, the sink is completely overflowing now!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is sheeting right over the front edge of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, yet her expression remains so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a serious amount of water, it's going to cause damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware she is of the spreading mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger and bigger, covering the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip in that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a strange scene of domestic oblivious chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
